TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowDesignerStorageService

summary.span: Fornece um serviço disponível para o host do Designer de Fluxo de Trabalho do Windows para armazenar e recuperar dados.

span.span: Provides a service available to the Windows Workflow Designer host to store and retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa interface é implementada e usada internamente pelo [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)], que é o host principal do [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)].This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)], which is the primary host of the [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)].
